name: dev.arctic.pkvault
description: Immutable Pokémon storage for Gens I to IX

scripts.prepare: next-ws patch; prisma generate; prisma migrate deploy; prisma db push; bun pm trust --all
scripts.update: git pull origin master; git submodule update --init --recursive; git submodule foreach git submodule update --init --recursive; bun x next-ws patch; bun x prisma generate; bun x prisma migrate deploy; bun x prisma db push; bun upgrade; bun install; bun pm trust --all
scripts.dev:reimage: echo "You must type exactly 'I agree.' to continue." && echo "This will delete your database containing ALL of your PKVault index data (not Pokémon save data)." && read -p "Confirmation: " confirm && if [ "$confirm" = "I agree." ]; then rm ./data/data.* || true && bun x prisma generate && bun x prisma db push --force-reset; else echo "Aborted: User didn't agree."; fi
